snippet: Security researchers say that hackers engineered networks of computers in data centers, allowing them to cripple online banking sites in a way that amateurs could not, report Nicole Perlroth and Quentin Hardy. It is a level of skill and...
abstract: Security researchers say that hackers engineered networks of computers in data centers, allowing them to cripple online banking sites in a way that amateurs could not, report Nicole Perlroth and Quentin Hardy. It is a level of skill and sophistication that suggests state-sponsored attacks.

headline.main: Daily Report:  Bank Hackers Used Data Centers to Supercharge Attacks
